articles.content:

articles.title: Nathan Lyon receives standing ovation from crowd after coming out to bat despite serious calf injury in second Ashes 2023 Test - Crictoday.com (Cricket News)
articles.description: Nathan Lyon's commitment to Australia's Ashes 2023 cause cannot be questioned after he came out to bat to help his side
articles.content:
Nathan Lyon’s commitment to Australia’s Ashes 2023 cause cannot be questioned after he came out to bat to help his side in the second innings of the Lord’s Test.
